TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WsdlImporter extends System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter

summary.span: 使用 WS-Policy 附件匯入 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 1.1 中繼資料。

span.span: Imports Web Services Description Language (WSDL) 1.1 metadata with WS-Policy attachments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 類別即可匯入中繼資料，以及將該資訊轉換成代表合約和端點資訊的各種不同類別。Use the class to import metadata as well as convert that information into various classes that represent contract and endpoint information. 的基底類別為 類別，它會定義會選擇性匯入合約和端點資訊的方法，並定義可公開任何匯入錯誤、接受有關匯入和轉換程序之型別資訊的屬性。The base class for , the class, defines methods that selectively import contract and endpoint information and properties that expose any import errors and accept type information relevant to the import and conversion process. 型別會使用來自其父型別的自訂原則匯入工具 ( 實作) 來處理自訂原則陳述式，而使用自己的自訂 WSDL 匯入工具 ( 實作) 來處理自訂 WSDL 項目。The type uses the custom policy importers ( implementations) from its parent type to handle custom policy statements and its own custom WSDL importers ( implementations) to handle custom WSDL elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 擴充中繼資料系統](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/extending-the-metadata-system.md)。For details, see [Extending the Metadata System](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/extending-the-metadata-system.md). 當從 WSDL 文件匯入原則時， 型別會嘗試最多 32 種附加至不同 WSDL 原則主體之原則替代項目的組合。When importing policy from WSDL documents, the type will try up to 32 combinations of policy alternatives attached to the different WSDL policy subjects. 如果沒有組合可以正常匯入，就會使用第一個組合來建構部分自訂繫結。If no combination imports cleanly, the first combination is used to construct a partial custom binding. 除了這些方法和屬性， 也會實作支援匯入繫結資訊的方法，以及可提供存取任何原則文件、WSDL 文件、WSDL 延伸和 XML 結構描述文件的屬性。In addition to these methods and properties, also implements methods that support importing binding information and properties that provide access to any policy documents, WSDL documents, WSDL extensions, and XML schema documents. 如需有關將 擴充成可支援自訂 WSDL 項目的資訊，請參閱 。For information about extending to support custom WSDL elements, see . 一般來說， 類別是用於有三個步驟的處理程序。Typically the class is used in a three-step process. 1. 建立 物件，並將 物件傳遞至建構函式。Create a object and pass a object to the constructor. 2. 呼叫適當的 `Import` 方法來擷取結果。Call the appropriate `Import` method to retrieve the results. 3. 檢查 屬性，即可判斷是否有任何匯入錯誤。Check the property to determine whether there are any import errors. > [!NOTE] > 當匯入 WSDL 連接埠類型時，如果連接埠類型的 QName 與 字典中的項目相符，便不會匯入該連接埠類型，而是改用已知的合約。When importing WSDL port types, if the QName of the port type matches an entry in the dictionary then the port type is not imported and the known contract is used instead. 在呼叫其中一個匯入方法之前，都不會從 屬性傳回任何值。No values are returned from the properties until one of the import methods is called. 自訂物件可以載入至以程式設計方式或使用用戶端組態[ <wsdlImporters> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/wsdlimporters.md)項目。Custom objects can either be loaded into the programmatically or using the client configuration [<wsdlImporters>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/wsdlimporters.md) element. 已匯入為服務端點的中繼資料無法用於建立執行階段或匯出中繼資料，因為匯入的端點沒有包含任何 Managed 型別資訊。Metadata that has been imported as service endpoints cannot be used to create a runtime or export metadata because the imported endpoints contain no managed type information. 若要使用中繼資料來建立用戶端或服務執行階段或產生中繼資料，您必須先從中繼資料產生及編譯程式碼，然後使用該型別資訊來建立使用 的新 物件。To use the metadata to create a client or service runtime or to generate metadata, you must first generate and compile code from the metadata and use that type information to create a new object using . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 來新增自訂 、匯入所有合約、編譯這些合約，並將它們儲存成檔案。The following code example shows how to use the to add a custom , import all contracts, and compile those contracts and save them to a file. [!code-csharp[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/client.cs#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 建構函式，即可從一組中繼資料文件建立 物件。Use the constructor to create a object from a set of metadata documents. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範最常見的搭配 類別使用 類別的方式。The following code example shows the most common use of class with the class. [!code-csharp[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/client.cs#10)]

span.span: The downloaded metadata.

param.span: 用於匯入自訂原則陳述式的自訂原則匯入工具。

param.name: wsdlImportExtensions

summary.span: 從指定的中繼資料、自訂原則匯入工具和自訂 WSDL 匯入工具建立 物件。

span.span: Creates a object from the specified metadata, custom policy importers, and custom WSDL importers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式，即可控制要匯入的中繼資料，以及控制要使用的原則和 WSDL 匯入工具。Use this constructor to control the metadata to be imported and the policy and WSDL importers to be used. > [!NOTE] > 當自訂原則匯入工具或自訂 WSDL 匯入工具傳遞至這個建構函式時，便不會載入在應用程式組態檔中所指定的任何自訂匯入工具。If custom policy importers or custom WSDL importers are passed to this constructor any custom importers specified in application configuration files are not loaded. 如果要新增自訂匯入工具，您必須在使用這個建構函式之前先重新建構匯入工具集合。If you want to add a custom importer, you must reconstruct the importers collections prior to using this constructor. 請參閱＜範例＞一節。See the Example section. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何在使用 `WSDLDocumentationImporter` 物件之前，先將新的自訂 WSDL 匯入工具 () 新增至預設的匯入工具組。The following code example shows how to add a new custom WSDL importer (the `WSDLDocumentationImporter`) to the default set of importers prior to using the object. [!code-csharp[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/client.cs#11)]

span.span: The argument is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式，即可控制要匯入的中繼資料，以及控制要使用的原則和 WSDL 匯入工具。Use this constructor to control the metadata to be imported and the policy and WSDL importers to be used. > [!NOTE] > 當自訂原則匯入工具或自訂 WSDL 匯入工具傳遞至這個建構函式時，便不會載入在應用程式組態檔中所指定的任何自訂匯入工具。If custom policy importers or custom WSDL importers are passed to this constructor any custom importers specified in application configuration files are not loaded. 如果要新增自訂匯入工具，您必須在使用這個建構函式之前先重新建構匯入工具集合。If you want to add a custom importer, you must reconstruct the importers collections prior to using this constructor. 請參閱＜範例＞一節。See the Example section. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何在使用 `WSDLDocumentationImporter` 物件之前，先將新的自訂 WSDL 匯入工具 () 新增至預設的匯入工具組。The following code example shows how to add a new custom WSDL importer (the `WSDLDocumentationImporter`) to the default set of importers prior to using the object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法，即可從中繼資料文件匯入所有繫結資訊，並將這些資訊當做 物件傳回。Use the method to import all binding information from the metadata documents and return them as objects. 使用傳回的物件之前，請先檢查 屬性以判斷是否有任何匯入錯誤。Check the property to determine whether there are any import errors before using the returned objects. 如果要匯入特定的 WSDL 繫結，請參閱 方法。To import a specific WSDL binding, see the method.

[!code-csharp[C_CustomWSDLExtensions#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_customwsdlextensions/cs/client.cs#8)]

value.span: 一組 物件，這些物件會描述中繼資料中的型別。

span.span: A set of objects that describe types in the metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在呼叫其中一個匯入方法之前，都不會填入這個屬性。This property is not populated until one of the import methods is called.
